io.o2mc.sdk.util

Class LogUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.o2mc.sdk.util.LogUtil

  • public final class LogUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class serves as a wrapper around the android.util.Log class. It makes sure logs are only generated in the debug build variant. Putting the checks in this class instead of before every log individually reduces human-errors (i.e. you might forget to add a check somewhere). This way, we can use the Android Studio search tool to make sure there is only one 'Log.e(...)' statement in the entire project. Suggestion: It would be better to use ProGuard to remove logs in the release build variant. This, however, has proven to require a lot of understanding about ProGuard and thus time consuming.
